abstract: JPMorgan Chase said its fourth-quarter net income fell 34 percent as problems from the housing slump widened in its investment banking and consumer businesses.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase said its fourth-quarter net income fell 34 percent as problems from the housing slump widened in its investment banking and consumer businesses.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase said Wednesday that its fourth-quarter net income dropped 34 percent as problems stemming from the housing market downturn widened in both its investment banking and consumer businesses.
